entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. James 07:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this morning and early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
